response.original_title: Pearl Harbor: The Heroes Who Fought Back
response.overview: Pearl Harbor: The Heroes Who Fought Back tells the stories of the men that went above and beyond the call of duty. The attack at Pearl Harbor thrust the United States into World War II, but it is also remembered for the many scenes of heroism and self-sacrifice that played out as sailors, airmen and civilians stepped up and fought back.
response.title: Pearl Harbor: The Heroes Who Fought Back
